live_updates: We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
27064.summary: Some customers in the South Wellington area of Nanaimo are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
27064.title: Oct 10 – Nanaimo (South Wellington) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
